name: Neon Mission
description:
Game in development with "Punto de Control" members:  Alec Lopez King ( https://goo.gl/GkQjAT),  Diego Villafuerte (https://goo.gl/niDCdX && https://soundcloud.com/diegovillafuerte ) ,Carlos Guizado Diaz (https://goo.gl/B67scN ) and me ,Jose Maria  Rojas Guimarey(https://goo.gl/vZ3cG6).

Puzzle-platformer local cooperative . Reach each level's end as fast as you can while working together.  Play with Keyboard or Joystick  (we recommend to play with DS4 controller and use USB connection)

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeonMissionPuntoControl/

Hear the full Soundtrack here: https://soundcloud.com/diegovillafuerte/sets/neon-mission

Punto de Control will be in Perú Game Expo to show you Neon Mission:

https://www.facebook.com/PeruGameExpo/photos/a.431298943912433.1073741828.373420...

http://perugameexpo.com/wp/

Game develop in UPC Game Lab (https://www.facebook.com/UPCGameLab/)

NEW UPDATE!

A little improvement in mechanics, better input for controls, more music and foleys, and 1 MORE LEVEL!
